name: Pirate Soccer
description:
A very challenging game. players control the hero while vigorous posture captain crew escape, while obstacles along the way toward the bow breakthrough. Do not let the rest of the crew captain snatched the hero, run farther as possible to get high score. Simple easy to play, but to get high score is very difficult, loving challenge players may wish to try.

Play

- Tap the screen to change the way forward.

- The right to judge, to avoid the enemy sprint forward.

Rule

- Hit the enemy or fall into the ocean end of the game.

- The rules are simple, anyone can easily get to play.

Come and download test your hand-eye coordination it.
